title: OLD MASTERS 11501 WIP Stain, Provincial
features: This product adds a great value
Easy application and superior Color control
For interior use and suitable for exterior use when top coated with a protective clear finish
description: Formulated to be a slow drying, controllable, multipurpose, heavy-bodied, interior wood stain. Excellent for use on old or new bare wood, on finished wood, and in the wood graining process on steel doors or other projects. This is the choice of the homeowner and the do-it-yourselfer. Covers approximately 500 sq. Ft. Per gallon. Easy application and superior color control. For interior use and suitable for exterior use when top coated with a protective clear finish.
